column1: Gini Wijnaldum, Mohamed Salah, Sadio Mane, Joel Matip and Trent AlexanderArnold make their European debut for LFC
Joel Matip on a mission to help write another chapter in Liverpool's rich European history. LFC
Joel Matip has backed Jurgen Klopps brand of highpressing football, despite an indifferent start to the season:
